references.paper_title: Accurate medium-range global weather forecasting with 3D neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces a 3D neural network model that achieves state-of-the-art performance on medium-range global weather forecasting, setting a new benchmark for the field.

references.paper_title: Learning skillful medium-range global weather forecasting
references.reason: This paper introduces GraphCast, a graph neural network model that demonstrates skillful medium-range weather forecasting, improving upon previous methods and demonstrating the power of graph neural networks for this task.

references.paper_title: ClimaX: A foundation model for weather and climate
references.reason: This paper introduces ClimaX, a foundation model that leverages a weather-specific embedding and adaptive layer normalization to achieve state-of-the-art performance, highlighting the importance of specialized architectures for weather forecasting.

references.paper_title: WeatherBench: a benchmark data set for data-driven weather forecasting
references.reason: This paper introduces WeatherBench, a benchmark dataset that facilitates the development and evaluation of deep learning models for weather forecasting, significantly advancing the field.

references.paper_title: FourCastNet: A global data-driven high-resolution weather model using adaptive Fourier neural operators
references.reason: This paper introduces FourCastNet, a novel neural network architecture based on adaptive Fourier neural operators that demonstrates state-of-the-art performance in global weather forecasting, highlighting the potential of this approach.
